extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected FortiOS Version
extracted_playbook.description: Determine if the FortiOS version is affected by checking the installed version against the vulnerable versions listed.

extracted_playbook.title: Update FortiOS to Fixed Version
extracted_playbook.description: Update the FortiOS to the latest fixed version to mitigate the vulnerability. Recommended versions are 6.2.16, 6.4.15, 7.0.14, 7.2.7, and 7.4.3.
